response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. After careful consideration, I am offering this exceptional item to you at a special price of $750,000. This is a rare chance to own something truly remarkable and potentially transformative. I believe its worth far exceeds the asking price, but I am willing to negotiate further if you provide me with your thoughts on this offer. I look forward to hearing your response and discussing how we can make this transaction beneficial for both parties.", "product_price": 750000}
